title: மனித மூளை போல கற்கும் AI: ANN, LMS மற்றும் பிழை திருத்தக் கற்றல்
description: In this episode, we explore how Artificial Neural Networks (ANN) learn like the human brain, the role of LMS algorithms, and how error correction learning improves AI systems. Perfect for beginners and AI enthusiasts who want to understand the foundations of intelligent learning systems.
